text: There were many composers behind this game, but I don't even need to look for confirmation to know this one's by none other than Yasunori Mitsuda. The Mitsuda bass is in full force, it feels straight from the Chrono series. This was a solid game and it makes me realize I'd love to get a new Bomberman with a lengthy solo adventure mode.
author: SupraDarky

text: The songs I really loved were the spy-themed theme song and first level music, personally. This is a cool song too.
